descriptionHtml:
[i][center][size=6]
[color=#ff0000]CHECK MY LATEST WORK [/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73864/?]LuciEN ENB[/url]

[b][color=#ff00ff]Realistika ENB[/color][/b]
[/size][i][size=6][color=#00ff00]-Pure Nordic Realistic Light-[/color][/size][/i][size=6]
[/size][/center][color=#00ff00]
[/color][color=#ff0000][center]-low fps loss (around 5/10fps)-[/center][/color]


[center][color=#ff0000][size=4]UPDATE VRS 1.2 [/size][size=3]:[/size][/color][color=#ffff00] Read this before download this preset,
I had some problem to fix and do a better adaptation of this preset with Climates of Tamriel (new version ) so now on i will support and recommend for a better look and perfomance the NLA version,This doesn't mean will not work with CoT
It will be always possible to use the CoT version for CoT users
but i will not update it anymore (well didn't needed update ).
You can always try to make CoT work together with Nla VRS, but at your own risk!
i didn't, so i cannot tell you if it works or not.
I'm very happy about how this preset perform with or without NLA (you can see in my videos how it looks and perform well) and i would really suggest to give it a try, this preset will work also with vanilla weathers even if NLA is really recommended!! i will also recommend the mod True Storm!
[/color]You don't need to download the particolare patch for enb by Mindflux, is already included[/center][color=#ffff00]
[/color][i][center][img]http://i.imgur.com/F7hcP81l.png[/img][/center][/i][color=#ffff00]
[/color][center]Realistika Enb - Climates of Tamriel

[img]http://i.imgur.com/KrRc7AJl.png[/img]
Realistika ENB - NLA version

[youtube]N6i5j5rCAUk[/youtube][youtube]vrX2My4OBkM[/youtube][/center][center][/center][center][/center]

[color=#ff0000][size=6][center]Description:[/center][/size]

[/color][size=6]This is my new preset ,my idea was to recreate the light that we have here in Scandinavia during Autumn/Spring period (you can check some of the compare screens down below with real light/game light)

[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/Mdl0aq9m.jpg[/img][img]http://i.imgur.com/wnu7i3Jm.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/wcxTaWym.jpg[/img][img]http://i.imgur.com/wdWSP6Qm.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/AHMZp60m.jpg[/img][img]http://i.imgur.com/34tkOGcm.png[/img][/center]
[/size]
[size=6]Skyrim recall about the Nordic culture so also the nature and the atmosphere that surround the game is...
[/size]

[b][size=5][color=#ff0000][center]HOW TO INSTALL:[/center][/color]
[/size][/b][center][color=#00ff00][size=5][b]-i left a read me with full explanation in the enb folder-
[/b][/size][/color][size=4]
download enbseries  Latest  
[/size][size=4]take the [/size][size=4]d3d9.dll [/size][size=4]into the skyrim game folder (choose wrapped vrs).[/size]
[size=4]In the Skyrimprefers.ini ( mydocuments/mygames/Skyrim ) set this value:[/size]
[size=4][color=#ff0000]bFloatPointRenderTarget=1[/color] [/size][size=4]must be set in SkyrimPrefs.ini file to make this mod work. 
[/size] 
[size=4]Skylighting to work correctly require rendering objects to shadow, so
edit manually following lines in file SkyrimPrefs.ini:[/size]
[color=#ff0000][size=4]bTreesReceiveShadows=1
[/size][size=4]bDrawLandShadows=1
[/size][/color][size=4][color=#ff0000]bShadowsOnGrass=1[/color]

[/size]If you don't have one of this strings you need add it 


[size=4]2) extract all files from the Archive and out of the box into the skyrim game folder, 
do any substitution if ask[/size]

[size=4]Launchskyrim with the tesv.exe, in the option Video Card set OFF
      AA-FA-FXAA, 
then close [/size]
[size=4]launch the game with SKSE launcher (if you use it)[/size]

[size=4]3) In game i subjest to low down to 0 the brightness or use it at
lower level[/size]

[size=4]enjoy[/size]


[size=4]For the [/size][color=#00ffff]REALISTIKA ENB for NLA[/color][size=4] before installing this ENB Preset :[/size]

[size=4]1 ) DOWNLOAD [/size][color=#ff0000]NLA ( Natural lighting and atmospheric )[/color][size=4] and install it 
[/size]following author instructions

[size=4]2) Download the [/size][color=#ff0000]REALISTIKA ENB for NLA[/color][size=4] and follow [/size]
[size=4]as mention previously

[/size][i][color=#00ff00][size=4]download enbseries  Latest  
[/size][size=4]take the [/size][size=4]d3d9.dll [/size][size=4]into the skyrim game folder (choose wrapped vrs).[/size]
[size=4]In the Skyrimprefers.ini ( mydocuments/mygames/Skyrim ) set this value:[/size][/color]
[size=4][color=#ff0000]bFloatPointRenderTarget=1[/color] [/size][color=#00ff00][size=4]must be set in SkyrimPrefs.ini file to make this mod work. 
[/size] 
[size=4]Skylighting to work correctly require rendering objects to shadow, so
edit manually following lines in file SkyrimPrefs.ini:[/size][/color]
[color=#ff0000][size=4]bTreesReceiveShadows=1
[/size][size=4]bDrawLandShadows=1
[/size][/color][size=4][color=#ff0000]bShadowsOnGrass=1[/color]

[/size][color=#00ff00]If you don't have one of this strings you need add it 


[size=4]2) extract all files from the Archive and out of the box into the skyrim game folder, 
do any substitution if ask[/size]

[size=4]Launchskyrim with the tesv.exe, in the option Video Card set OFF
      AA-FA-FXAA, 
then close [/size]
[size=4]launch the game with SKSE launcher (if you use it)[/size]

[size=4] In game i subjest to low down to 0 the brightness or use it at
lower level[/size][/color][/i]
[size=4] 3) You need to do all the substition as asked [/size]

[color=#ff0000][size=5]ALL THE FILES ARE VIRUS CLEAN [/size][/color][/center][size=4]

[/size][size=3][color=#ff0000][center]UNISTALL[/center][/color]

[/size][center]Just take all the file out from ur skyrim directory, scripts clean[/center]


[size=4][color=#ff0000][center]Mods Suggested:[/center][/color]
[/size][center][size=3]This Preset has been built with ELFX and Climates of Tamriel so[/size]
[size=3]I suggest to use ELFX and Climates of Tamriel for a better performance 
(i will describe how to set them down below)
[/size][size=3]Anyway the ENB works great also with different set up 
[/size][size=3]Download all the mods that will make ur Skyrim beautiful 
(i would only recommend ”TRUE STORM” ) 

[/size][size=3]If you use  ELFX:
[/size][size=3]just don't get the weather patch
[/size][size=3]Choose all the option as ur taste, 
i'll suggest to set also the enchanter (i recommend it),
but it's a matter of taste

[/size][size=3]If you use  Climates of Tamriel:
[/size][size=3]Set all the option DEFAULT (u don't need darker nights, enb does it)
[/size][size=3]add the weather patch for Climates of Tamriel and set it like this:
[/size][size=3]Choose FOG (my taste)
[/size]snow -40%


[size=3]NLA - natural lighting and atmosphere 

[/size][color=#ffff00][size=3]Pay attention, I didn't try to make work NLA with the new version of CoT,maybe they can work together maybe not 
I don't take any responsability if you want to try it ,
this if you have intention to try the NLA vrs with CoT.[/size]
[/color][/center]

[center][color=#ff0000][size=6]PLEASE, IF YOU LIKE IT, CHECK MY OTHER WORK:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65406/?]DARKLIGHT ENB
[/url]

[/size][/color][color=#ffff00][size=5]Join my youtube page:[url=https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCAMiwPIlGD8vlklzeimnvnw]Lest4t Skyrim Mods[/url]

[/size][/color][color=#ffff00][size=5]Join my Facebook Page for news:[url=https://www.facebook.com/L3st4tskyrimmods?ref=aymt_homepage_panel]L3st4t Skyrim Mods[/url]


[/size][/color][color=#00ff00][size=6]REMEMBER TO ENDORSE or

[img]http://i.imgur.com/T3GKInLl.png[/img][/size][/color][/center]




[color=#ffff00][size=5]CREDITS:[/size][/color]


[size=4]I want to thank the[/size][b]Skyrim-Italia FB Fanpage[/b][size=4]for all the support and help i had testing the ENB on different set up, i don't need to put names , you know who you are!!
[/size][b]Vent0 [/b][size=4]and his incredible sweetfx setting (that is included in my ENB - CoT vrs )  [/size][u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57242/][size=4]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57242/[/size][/url][/u][size=4]?  EWALD for his incredible Sweetfx setting  (included in the NLA VRS )- Mindflux for his particle patch enb
[/size][b]Matso for his[/b]enbeffectprepass.fx,Confidenceman for his NLA presetting [size=4](For any permission issues ,i followed the instruction left from autors ) [/size][size=4]AND of course [/size][b]Boris Vorontsov [/b][size=4]for ENB[/size][size=3]
[/size]
[/i]
